    • validateDateNotInPast

      public static void validateDateNotInPast(LocalDate date, boolean allowNull)
      Validates that a date is not in the past Optional null check, because items in the recipe does not need expiration date
      Parameters:
      date - The date to validate.
      allowNull - Whether null is allowed.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the date is in the past.

    • validationEnum

      public static void validationEnum(Unit unit)
      Validates the input of the unit String against Unit enum.
      Parameters:
      unit - The unit string to validate
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the unit is null, empty, or not a valid Unit enum value.
